name: mindmap
title: M.I.N.D.M.A.P. - Moerills Indecision Negator, Decision Maker, And Planner
description: Adds a new view to Journal Entries for creating mind map like graphs. In this view you can create a network graph for organizing your relations, flow charts, campaign structures, ideas or whatever you can imagine! Just drag the data from the sidebar to begin planning.
author: Moerill
